sentence.Network_en: His dark hair was all awry.
All my plans for the party had gone awry.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的聚会计划全乱了套。

awoken 唤醒awry 歪曲ax 斧头

list.abs: GO词组_我说2句吧_百度贴吧 ... go away\v. 走开, <口>作祈使句, 别傻了! go awry\v. 出错, 失败 go back home\v. 回家.
成人英语三级：阅读理解解题技巧 ... 9.rely on 依赖，依靠 10.go awry 出岔子，失败；（人）背离正道 11.substitute 代替物，代用器.
look away 把脸转过去。look awry 斜视。look back 回顾, 倒退。回顾,追忆。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from a- 'on' + wry

entry.def: If something goes awry, it does not happen in the way it was planned.

example.ex: She was in a fury over a plan that had gone awry.
example.tran: 计划出了问题，她很愤怒。

entry.def: If something is awry, it is not in its normal or proper position.

example.ex: His dark hair was all awry.

means.word_mean: 1. turned or twisted toward one side;

sentences.sentence: "a...youth with a gorgeous red necktie all awry"- G.K.Chesterton
"his wig was, as the British say, skew-whiff"

means.word_mean: 1. away from the correct or expected course;

sentences.sentence: "something has gone awry in our plans"
"something went badly amiss in the preparations"

means.word_mean: 2. turned or twisted to one side;

auth_sentence.content: The precipitating event is an art heist gone awry.
auth_sentence.res_content: The precipitating event is an art heist gone awry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The precipitating event is an art heist gone awry.

auth_sentence.content: He cannot afford these reforms to go awry.
auth_sentence.res_content: He cannot afford these reforms to go awry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He cannot afford these reforms to go awry.

auth_sentence.content: Ninety minutes later, a safety experiment went awry.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ninety minutes later, a safety experiment went awry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ninety minutes later, a safety experiment went awry.
